website_summaries.verdict: Delivers everything parents look for, including sturdy build, attractive looks, and exceptional versatility.
pros: Adjustable mattress height and JPMA certification
converts to a toddler bed/daybed/full-size daybed
cons: Some components for converting it as baby grows must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to put together. A lot of people complained about the screws not having caps because of "aesthetics" but you can legit buy a bag of those for a few bucks so it's really not a big deal. Also the red paper telling you to contact them if there's any problems is a courtesy note not a warning 🙄 they're trying to save you the hassle of shipping the entire thing back when they can easily replace any piece you need and often for free. I also seen someone complain about the smell of paint thinner. It's the smell of styrofoam. It'll air out within a day. There's legit nothing wrong with this crib
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a crib within the last month of my pregnancy... Our diy project was falling apart.. But this turned out to be great! We were pleasantly surprised at how much we love this crib. Comparable ones are twice the price... We looked everywhere. With shipping to your door in two days, you just can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Stach

customer_reviews.title: NOT recommended - faulty parts
customer_reviews.text: You must be kidding. Starting with the RED bold-lettered pamphlet attached to the package warning buyers that ‘sometimes product may not be satisfactory’ - and all the way through to mis-aligning boards and bed parts - this bed felt like one step short of a scam. Please be warned. @Amazon are we sure about these ratings ?
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell for a “non-toxic” rated crib
customer_reviews.text: All though this crib is pretty and seems well built, I am very disappointed. I bought this specific crib after weeks of research because of its claim on being the safest and highest quality non-toxic rating... well this crib came smelling like straight paint thinner... it made me and my husband sick just putting it together. I could smell it through the box when it came and hoped that airing it out would solve the problem. Well it’s been two straight days of airing it out with open windows and fans and it still stinks terribly... I obviously am not going to be putting my infant child in this crib smelling like that.
customer_reviews.author: Judd S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib! I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: We had looked around for cribes and just couldn’t stomach spending $600 for a crib. Even if it did turn into a bed I’m not sure if that is what his style or future room will look good in! So this was a great reasonable compromise. The crib is super cute, easy to assemble, and is heavy enough to be sterdy but light enough to move by an adult. It feels like and not cheap. I would defiantly reccoemend it!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy crib
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and sturdy crib that was easy to set up. I recommend two people setting it up. It is a solid wood frame that came nicely packaged. There are 3-4 hieght settings for the mattress and it adjusts by removing and installing the screws into the different holes. The only issue is that it is a convertible crib but if you want to set it up as a toddler bed with the guard, you must buy that separately.
customer_reviews.author: J-Koneezy

customer_reviews.title: My kid’s leg got stuck
customer_reviews.text: This crib was great and we had no complaints until my 14 month old’s leg got stuck at his thigh between the slats and he woke up screaming bloody murder. We had to break the crib. This isn’t supposed to be possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pay extra for something better!!! First of all, this is NOT a 4 in 1 crib!!! You do not get the toddler bed rail or anything at all to convert the crib!! •It smells of paint thinner! •It's flimsy. •Crib mattress is too small.....leaving a huge gap on two separate sides!!! •It's unlevel once put together. •My 10 month old looks like she can tip it over while inside!!! Overall...spend the little extra money on something built with our little one in mind!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks great once it is put together
customer_reviews.text: I am seven months pregnant and put this together myself. Not because my husband wouldn't help it was just that I didn't really need help. My nine year old asked to help so I let her hold a couple pieces while I screwed them in but overall it was very easy and can be done by one person. Everything showed up intact and ready for assembly. I didn't see any dents or scratches. Getting this has made me very excited to start decorating my nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib, instructions were easy to follow. Put it together by myself in about 90 minutes. Would have been quicker with help! Very sturdy. Arrived quicker than estimated ship date.
customer_reviews.author: AmyT

customer_reviews.title: Hazardous Crib, Terrible Company
customer_reviews.text: I would caution anyone against buying this crib for the following reasons. 1) When we received the crib, it was missing the guardrail for the conversion to a toddler bed. We didn’t realize this until we went to transition the bed and Delta refused to replace the missing part. 2) My child has gotten their leg stuck in the slats of this crib multiple times where we had to push their leg out with them screaming. 3) The paint comes off easily. At night, my child chewed on the rail of the crib and we found paint chips on their face. I recommend avoiding this product and this company if at all possible.
customer_reviews.author: Juniper

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crib after I had two previous cribs showed up broken from a different brand and manufacturer. This showed up on time and it was in pretty good condition. Nothing was broken, all parts were there. It was packaged nicely. Little scuff mark on the top that I'll add a little paint to. I was disappointed though as its honestly really cheap looking compared to the price and the previous cribs I've purchased. I expected it to be bigger. Only using for the next year so I guess it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and it worked for us, but it is missing parts to make it 4-in-1 crib
customer_reviews.text: We needed an option for the occasional visit by our grandchild. The crib arrived as scheduled, easy to assemble, and looks nice and study. It is smaller than what she has in her own room and my daughter said it looks like a mini-crib. But it works for us and had a reasonable price. One misleading item is the 4 in 1 convertible heading. The package was missing the parts that is supposed to turn it to a toddler bed as depicted in the product's page. Those may be extra items that need to be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Saeed D.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together!!  Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped crib to son and daughter-in-law for new baby due in March! They were thrilled and surprised when they got it! My son put it together in one evening and they are loving it! Shipping was awesome and fast! This will be my fourth grandchild and everyone of them has had a convertible crib! But this one is beautiful and perfect for our new “granddaughter “!!!
customer_reviews.author: memaw

customer_reviews.title: Love this color!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the dark chocolate crib and it is so beautiful. We put this together in probably an hour. Really sturdy and high quality. Bought a Newton crib mattress to go with it and it fits perfectly. Also ordered the matching dresser so we will see how that turns out, otherwise this crib is so beautiful! Highly recommend. No strong smells noted like other reviews and arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice looking crib, I got it in white. This is my first crib so I have nothing to compare it to. But when baby does accidentally take a little tumble and falls and hits her leg or her head on the bars it does make a very loud sound, I hope my little one isn’t getting hurt. Eventually she’ll get better balance. It would have been nice if the four corner posts could have been rounded on the inside instead of a sharp edge on the inside, because just in case baby falls down and hits her head on the inner corner it would be better if it was rounded.
customer_reviews.author: :)AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a wood crib
customer_reviews.text: We were Leary to buy a crib off amazon however so glad we did! The Delta Emery 4-1 crib was better than we expected! Affordable, sturdy, and easy to assemble. It took about 45 minutes. We did not have any packaging problems, missing pieces, or cracked/damaged wood. I’m 5’4 and it is a great height for me to reach in and out to lift baby. Would definitely recommend this product or other delta products.
customer_reviews.author: K. Perry

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.text: I did not think I needed to read the “fine print” when the description says 4 in 1 and shows a picture of all 4. This ONE item only converts to TWO things, crib or daybed. They want you to spend more money to get the accessories for the guardrail and full size bed. Not happy with Delta. This is NOT 4 in 1.
customer_reviews.author: PianoBuysAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great crib for the price! I am very pleased with this purchase. I was a little concerned about the quality, but it is a very sturdy crib. My husband put this together in less than an hour. My only complaint is that it did have a very strong chemical smell that took weeks to dissipate. We had to have the windows open for days to get rid of the smell. I would highly recommend not buying this crib right before baby comes due to the potent, lingering smell. Other than that, it's the perfect crib for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This crib is exactly what I wanted for my granddaughter. Just keep in mind not to remove information attached to the mesh that holds the mattress up. I was able to assemble it myself. It is sturdy, came in perfect condition and yes at first it had a slight odor but this disappeared quickly. The smell seemed to be a combination of paint and wood. I assembled it about a week before my granddaughter came to visit so by then the smell was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Paris

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts & labeled wrong!
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISING!!! I had this crib delivered today This is the first review I write EVER because this was supposed to be a nice crib for my baby boy. I hate that it says 4 in 1 and find out there's A MISSING PIECE ( the rail that is supposed to convert it into a toddler bed). It also makes no sense in how the instructions say the labels for piece (C) and (D) are supposed to face each other but it makes no sense because at the time we put them facing each other the side of the label (D) has no holes unless it's facing away from label ( C)
customer_reviews.author: LettyD

customer_reviews.title: We recommend this crib.
customer_reviews.text: The reason we gave this crib 4 instead of 5 stars is that, as this crib is new, we cannot comment on its longevity. We opened the box upon receiving it and found all of the pieces in perfect condition and they were all marked correctly for assembly. It took my husband and I approximately an hour and a half to put it together. We recommend two people assemble the crib because it is easier and less time consuming if one person holds the pieces together while the other screws them in place. The crib is sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this crib a few days ago. To my surprise I was able to put it together almost by myself. I needed my husband to hold it a few times! It took less than an hour to get it assembled. It matches Deltas other nursery furniture (grey) perfectly! It’s an absolutely beautiful crib!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Reese

customer_reviews.title: Treated with chemicals?
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and feels sturdy, but it seems to be treated with some kind of chemical or skin irritant. Every time I rest my forearms on the side of the crib, I get a rash wherever my skin makes contact with it. I never put my baby in it because he always tries to lick the side of the crib and I don’t want him ingesting a mystery chemical.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lakenan

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful crib
customer_reviews.text: This crib is beautiful! I got the gray color and I am so in love with it! This crib was packaged very well in the box and all the hardware is of excellent quality. Putting it together was easy, the directions were clear. I love that this bed can convert to a toddler bed, and eventually we will get a full size bed and can use it as a headboard.
customer_reviews.author: AnaAndreaXoxo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful and an incredible value
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say that I was blown away at the quality of this crib. The thing is absolutely gorgeous and looks way more expensive than it is. I got the espresso brown color and it was totally blemish free and didnt have a harsh smell like some reviewers have mentioned. The bed is super sturdy and easy to put together, anyone could do it. All of the tools and nuts and bolts were included, and the instructions were clear and straightforward for the most part. A few parts required some more careful reading, but I was rushing around so any mistakes were my fault lol. Great value and I'm 100% satisfied. I'd buy it again any day.
customer_reviews.author: C WeathTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.text: Just love this crib. Good size, easy to assemble and dissemble. Our infant just loves sleeping in it. It is very light weight so you can move it easily from one room to another. The color is good too. It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: kron

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: While I was pregnant, I spent so much time researching different cribs. I wanted one that was sturdy and looked nice, without spending a small fortune. I found that this one had great reviews and was a decent price, so we gave it a shot. I am so glad we went with this one! It cost far less than others of the same quality, and looks perfect in her nursery! We will be purchasing the addition to turn it into a toddler bed when the times comes, too!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget L

customer_reviews.title: Was there a recall on this crib?
customer_reviews.text: My child’s leg got in between the bars. Which isn’t okay but it also got caught in the corner. Alright maybe it was a building problem. I purchased two because I have twins. Both of their legs have gotten stuck in between the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina LaFave

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Build!
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to build. My husband and I did it in about 45 minutes. Just make sure you pay attention to the nail sizes because we messed up toward the end and had to fix it which made us take a few extra minutes. We also bought the matching 6 drawer dresser and it all looks so good. :) It's super sturdy and made of real wood which we love.
customer_reviews.author: betsyannie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but some assembly annoyances
customer_reviews.text: People say it looks pretty good. Assembly can be done by one person but could get frustrating at certain steps. I know drop down cribs aren't recommended anymore which is sad because non drop down cribs like this can be a back breaker. Wish they would have provided a hex key that doesn't hit the mattress frame so you have to take it out and reinsert it as opposed to being able to continuously turn / screw in the screw. Seems like a QC, engineering detail oversight. Overall ok.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lam

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. Took my husband about an hr to do. We absolutely love it and we are gr8ful to those who wrote previous reviews and posted pictures. This was the reason we bought this crib and we are so happy we did. For the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sade Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have had to assemble a lot of furniture over the years and this was one of the easiest. The instructions are clear and the crib is in relatively few pieces to make install a breeze. I was also impressed with how everything fit together perfectly, this allows for a very sturdy crib. Completely balanced and no wobble at all. Pictured is the crib with the platform at level 2 position (middle). The mattress did not come with the crib. It is a standard crib mattress purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and beautiful crib for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to instructions and assembly should go smooth. Assembly with my 3 year old son took about 30 - 45 minutes. Looks nice and I had no issues with damaged parts which is a shipping or handling issue and should not be deducted off the review for the product. Give the shipping those bad reviews. Not the product people. I see a lot of that here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Too long for standard size mattresses
customer_reviews.text: Really concerned that the "standard" crib mattress is significantly too small. My toddler is now 2 years old and has had to be rescued from having his legs stuck down between the metal springs, the side of the crib, and the mattress. Kind of upset that this is an issue when the recommended mattress doesn't work in there. It took about an hour for my husband and father (whose an engineer) to put it together. Cursing was only involved when someone dropped something on a finger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: others looks good now.
customer_reviews.text: I buy it for my upcoming baby. So I just unpackage it, not install it now. But it has heavy taste, you need to open your window and let it clear its own taste for several days. others looks good now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Crib
customer_reviews.text: This crib came without any dings or scratches. It was well packaged, and the instructions were very clear. My 6 year old was eager to put it together and not wait on dad. The two of us conquered this project in about an hour. It was easier than I thought it would be. I let my 6 year old get in to test it out. It held up just fine and we feel good about putting our new baby in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Came without parts
customer_reviews.text: The crib came without parts. So disappointing. We really wanted to set up our nursery before our baby comes home from the NICU - unfortunately all of the Delta furniture items we purchased aren’t properly made and they were all returned
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: A small fly is "stuck" underneath the paint on the rail of the crib!
customer_reviews.text: The crib looks good, but unfortunately our crib comes with a small fly that apparently got painted under the transparent coating of the side of the crib.. see photos attached. It's not removable -- I've tried to scratch it off but no success, because it's like specimen of the fly on the crib. It's quite disgusting to look at... I am disappointed that our crib comes with this imperfection. I hope the Company can send me just the replacement part of that so I don't need to look at this every day!
customer_reviews.author: clionekimura

customer_reviews.title: There are even sweet touches where things are tied on with ribbon
customer_reviews.text: Delta does an incredible job with instructions, packaging, etc. It made assembly an absolute dream, which you will find is not the case when reading other manufacturer's reviews. There are even sweet touches where things are tied on with ribbon, etc. Extra parts are separate and labeled as such.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Crib- So happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So thrilled with this purchase of the lancaster Crib. I searched around for awhile and I’m glad I went with this one. First off, everything came packed wonderfully. Takes a bit to put together but the instructions are awesome and made it easy! It’s just a stunning crib design! It’s a true beautiful white and I love the sleekness of it! If you are on the fence, buy it! For the price and the quality you will be so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peezy!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the crib all by myself, with the tools that came with the crib. Easy instructions all the way thru. It mentioned using a flat head screwdriver to hold the nut in place while your inserting the screw. Simple enough. I was over-all pleased, this was the first time assembling a crib and purchasing one online. I was concerned of anything and everything going wrong but it all went well and I'm so thankful! I would recommend and consider as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Estela

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for $200.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can say about this crib is that it's easy to assemble. The directions are really easy. That's where everything positive ends. I bought two because I'm having twins. Both sets have scratches on the pieces. I managed to put one together no problems. The other crib you can't even put the bottom piece on the crib because it's bent so it literally wont line up with anything at all! Their support number doesn't give you a person at all and they blame the coronavirus for their crap service.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: because the tool provided for the job was a perfect fit for the awkward positioned screws
customer_reviews.text: This crib was nicer quality than I was expecting! It took maybe an hour or less for my husband to put it together and he commented how the people who designed it were really thinking, because the tool provided for the job was a perfect fit for the awkward positioned screws. We haven't used it yet, due in 5 weeks, but the crib looks great! Also, hardly any smell when we opened the box, and no smell at all now. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great crib and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The crib was exactly as described and very easy to put together. Suggestion- do not cut the package of instructions off of the spring. This is the only way to know which side is supposed to be up. I cut it off when I opened the box then accidentally built it with the springs going the wrong direction (and had to flip it).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble/Looks Great/Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The crib came packaged well and without damage. I'm not someone who is very handy when it comes to building things. The instructions were clear and easy to follow along. Didn't take me very long to put together, even with my limited skills. Crib is vert sturdy and baby seems to love it. It is easily adjustable to change the depth as she grows and can be turned into a bed although I believe it requires another part for that. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Q.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little white crib
customer_reviews.text: I let my husband pick the crib out and he liked this one. Was a little apprehensive at first, but so far really glad we bought this one. It very affordable unlike those at the baby stores. I put it together myself and it seems to be very sturdy. In the picture of the crib there are things in it. Don't worry before the baby comes all that stuff will be taken out.
customer_reviews.author: dawn r. curtsinger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy. Was missing bolts.
customer_reviews.text: Seems okay, baby still 6 months away. Had to make a trip to Home Depot to get missing hardware. The gray color doesn’t seem to have the same odor others talk about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bianca white one recently and we love it so far; just gotta wait on baby boy's arrival :) Affordable and not too tall for my 5'2 stature. It took us less than an hour to assemble together. Didn't notice any unusual smells, so not sure what the previous reviews were complaining about.
customer_reviews.author: chellie

customer_reviews.title: Love but pay attention to parts.
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib so much. It wasnt the easiest thing ever to install. Probably took my husband and me about an hour maybe a little over. The screws were labeled all m17 m45 and we didnt notice til the last part that we had mixed up 2 different m's it was an easy enough fix but frustrating. Looks great tho and is very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib, super cute! Great quality, easy to build, delivered quickly and excellent value for the money. My cousin spent almost $1000 on her crib and it looks almost exactly the same as mine. Mattress is adequate too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sarah cruz

customer_reviews.title: It is great once you have it together
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it together, this crib is awesome! My only complaint is that it was difficult to get together. It is only a few pieces, but something about it made it difficult. Maybe it was the instructions? However, once past that issue, the quality of the crib is phenomenal and our baby loves it. I also like that it will convert as he grows older. Highly recommend to anyone wanting a good quality crib for a lower price, but beware it may make you pull your hair out when putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with damages.
customer_reviews.text: The crib arrived with two damages. I’m 37 weeks pregnant, so instead of spending my energy on doing usefull things around the house I had to spend a lot of time contacting customer service, taking pictures of the box, of damages, finding all necessar information of to solve the issue🤦‍♀️ And spending time on waiting for their answer instead of assembling the crib and enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib! I do get a small sense of the chemical smell that other reviews referenced but we decided to keep it and I don’t think the smell is there anymore. It’s sturdy and easy to put and take down. We moved multiple times and had to assemble and disassemble multiple times. It really doesn’t take long.
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to set up. Looks cute! There is one piece on the headboard that's chipped.... I guess I'll have to say oh well at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It was so simple to put together and it only took about 30 minutes to assemble. It is very sturdy and I don't fear putting my baby in there at all. There is a strong smell so I would suggest getting it quite a bit of time in advance.
customer_reviews.author: ChristyW

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are very easy to follow, so putting this together was very easy. The crib itself seems sturdy yet lighter than expected. This is a less expensive crib so keep in mind it is no designer crib, but for the money you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: really strong paint smell....
customer_reviews.text: I bought it one week ago and received it recently; however, the paint smell was still REALLY REALLY strong after putting in the living room for couple days with all windows opened whole day...If the smell is still strong like be4 after couple days, I will consider to return it and get money back and dare not to let my baby sleep in. Overall, price is great, quality is great, assembly is easy to handle, just except the strong paint smell.......
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib. Its easy to assemble, looks great. I guess 2 stars less because, some parts came with minor dents and scratches and in parts looks little used. It didn't bother us so much, so we didn't return it, but would have loved to have scratch free all new looking crib
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed before my daughter was born. She is now a little over 2 years old and i am about to convert it to a toddler bed. We love the crib and my daughters loves sleeping in it. Will see how she will do once we give her the opportunity to climb in and out by herself. If we have another child, i will buy the same one, but maybe in a different color. Although the white has been really good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Erhard

customer_reviews.title: crib
customer_reviews.text: what a great crib. put it together, put the waterproof pad on the mattress and added a sheet. pout the baby in the crib just to see if he would like it. he was asleep in less than five minutes and it wasn't even bed time. i am so glad i bought this for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: P. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, cute crib with time consuming assembly
customer_reviews.text: It is a great crib for the price. It is sturdy. Does not come with mattress, so you'll need to buy one separately. My only complaint is how long it takes to put together. It took us 2-3 hours. It also had one scuff mark on the paint, but it was in the back so we didn't really care. If you have the time and patience it seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyAmazon_24

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only had 1 tiny problem and that was the top left screw hole for the front if the crib wasnt really drilled correctly but I got it to work. Highly recommended doesnt smell like paint I assembled my self while pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Prepare to help your significant other because putting this beauty together is a two man job. Packaging was great and everything came unharmed from shipping. Very well built and sturdy, but it looks low to me? Maybe it's because the last time I was around a crib I was a youngster haha.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Adams

customer_reviews.title: Beat up box
customer_reviews.text: I have not opened this product yet because it is a gift but I wanted to put it out there on record that when it was delivered, the box had no fewer than five holes and two long scratches.
customer_reviews.author: KrauseMouse

customer_reviews.title: All good!
customer_reviews.text: So far very pleased. Baby isn't here yet. The assembly was fairly simple. The hardware was all clearly marked which helped a TON! There were no imperfections in the wood/paint job that I could tell. Feels sturdy. Product as described. I'm not looking forward to lowering the mattress in the future though. Not going to be a very simple process. Of course, I've never owned any other crib before so I don't know how it compares to others. Overall very pleased and the price was good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: After doing much research on cribs and quality of various ones this one was our favorite! Easy to assemble with great quality and design suitable for any nursery! We love the functionality of the product as well as the multiple different stages it can be utilized for. This brand provides great products at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Suhuir Dajani

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely looooove this crib! It looks good and is sturdy but not too heavy. It was fairly easy to put together (I did not do it personally, but supervised) lol but it didn’t take my brother and older son long to do. My brother doesn’t have children or ever put together a crib and was impressed by it. I hope the coordinating dresser is as good.
customer_reviews.author: Retha

customer_reviews.title: still smell really bad after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the only review I leave on Amazon so far. I bought the crib on Sep and it still has strong smell after 3 months. I kept all windows open everyday and it did not help. I end up buying another crib from Ikea. I already threw alway the boxes so I can not return the bed either. It's a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: BINGHUI GONG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib so much! It’s a beautiful color and is so easy to match things with! The quality is amazing and is a must have for any parent looking for a crib! It’s easy to put together and looks amazing! I love that it’s a 6-in-1 crib so it can grow with our babies! Definitely check out this crib!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika G

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. We have had it from day 1 and it seems durable enough. Baby has started kicking the slats in her sleep now at 6 mths and they make noises but don't seem to hurt her legs. Have not purchased the conversion kit for toddler bed, but would be curious to see if that really works. Nice appearance and design.
customer_reviews.author: Sonal D

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow && Light weight
customer_reviews.text: True to color. Upon assmebling this item i came across a few missing screws. Its alot lower to ground then exoected and very narrow in length and width. Very light weight easy to slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Panda88

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s a great crib but I noticed that the paint has rubbed ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a great crib but I noticed that the paint has rubbed off in quite a few places. This is concerning especially with teething kids. We cosleep so the crib has had extremely light usage, but even with that the paint is still coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Aulona

customer_reviews.title: Parents beware!  Unsafe for infants!
customer_reviews.text: HEALTH CONCERN: Very cheap quality paint is used. After unboxing, the crib made the entire room smell of a strong paint odor, making it almost unusable. We then tried wiping it down with mild soap and water and the paint started to chip and crack. Then it would flake off. Infants put everything in their mouth. This is a very unsafe crib.
customer_reviews.author: Gilad

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the Price and Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We just received this product today and built it in one hour and a half! Would have been less but my 3 year old wanted to help lol It’s such a beautiful and sturdy crib! I absolutely love the color. The only thing I would improve is the smell of paint but I’m sure it will AIR OUT in the next couple of days other than that the price is amazing for the quality of the crib 🙌🏻 I LOVE IT and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. BeastMode

customer_reviews.title: its ok but has dents
customer_reviews.text: came with many dents and instructions were not all there so use your head more then anything. its sturdy and good to grow but needs more care from the factory, dents not caused by shipping
customer_reviews.author: chii

customer_reviews.title: Paint odor
customer_reviews.text: For more then three weeks we kept it outside in the balcony due to strong paint odor. Tried washing it with vinegar and water. Kept it in the sun and used a fan on it. The smell just does not go away. After an hour indoors the smell gets really intense right inside, where a baby is supposed to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay

customer_reviews.title: Received crib timely fashion and when we were almost don’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Received crib timely fashion and when we were almost don’t building it realized there was a dent in the front part of the crib 😔 but we were almost done building it and had already thrown away the box it came in to return
customer_reviews.author: MeliAmador25

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crib
customer_reviews.text: This crib is perfect! Love , love and love! My baby nursery looks so cute!
customer_reviews.author: @mamae_brasicana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Took me about an hour to put together. Thoughts in the design are solid. Shipment was fast and packaged well. Have not tested durability. But will soon get it's use.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great crib! So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell yet if it’s durability is good or not because my baby is only three months old! However I can tell you it has a beautiful design, it is easy to clean if a mess happens. Fairly easy to assemble, comes with all the tools to do it. Great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Alito Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great solid crib
customer_reviews.text: This crib is adorable and great value for your money. It looks really high quality and is fairly easy to put together. My only complain is that the bolts don't have any cover at all so the hardware is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: IDesign

customer_reviews.title: Nice design!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this before my son, who is now two, was born. It has been sturdy and a lovely addition to my son’s room. My son has managed to peel some of the paint from the rails with his mouth. But very minor. I just hope the paint doesn’t have any lead.
customer_reviews.author: Grisel Blanco-Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: We still have my son in the crib and haven’t used any of the other parts to convert it to a toddler bed and etc. However so far we have been 100% satisfied. Great color, study, and product was as described
customer_reviews.author: Cutlerkids

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this crib. So cute, I put it together by myself (pregnant) in under an hour. The directions are easy to follow and the hardware is delivered in a way that makes the process a breeze. I am so excited for our little one to enjoy it as much as I am (already!)
customer_reviews.author: SarBear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crib, great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome crib. Great quality, beautiful, didn’t come with a bunch of dings, I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Boone

customer_reviews.title: Baby crib
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I will say is it was missing the guard rail that I need now for my son he is 2 but the crib will be used for our next child it is sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Zach brobst

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot nicer than I expected. Packed really well and it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I chose this crib based on reviews of easy to follow assembly instructions. They were simple to follow and all of the holes lined up great. It says to not use power tools, but we happened to have a matching bit and used an electric screwdriver on very low setting to start all of the screws in and then used the Allen wrench to tighten the rest of the way down. It took us about 40 minutes to assemble the first cribs snow only about 25 for the second. Yay for twins!! I did not notice the odor that some people talked about in some reviews. Can’t wait for the babies to arrive and use them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bowman

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: really great product, rich look design and keeps my little one safe. I wanted to give 5 stars but giving 4 stars as it is little difficult in adjusting the mattress levels, hard part is to unscrew it and screw it back very little room for your hands. other wise this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Nice grandchild crib.
customer_reviews.text: The crib is sturdy and does its job. We use only for the grandbaby, so it doesn't get a lot of use. Perfect for grandma's house.
customer_reviews.author: DGR

customer_reviews.title: Safe sleep space and cute
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, simple design but with fashion in mind. Looks cute in girls nursery as well as keeping her safe during A climbing phase!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great price point
customer_reviews.text: This took my husband maybe 20 minutes to assemble, it was super easy and not complicated at all! We love the paint and quality. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GPP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: The crib was beautiful, sturdy, well constructed, and a lovely piece of furniture that will grow with the baby and provide many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma J

customer_reviews.title: Truly easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily, as promised (as a single woman putting it together herself, I was pleasantly surprised!) Seems very sturdy and looks just as pictured. I did it slowly and methodically in 3 hours, but could have been done faster, especially if a second person nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great crib choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my daughter’s 3-month-old. She LOVES it. It is sturdy and so pretty in the baby’s room. The price was great and it will be used for years since it converts to a youth bed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B. Marbury

customer_reviews.title: great inexpensive crib
customer_reviews.text: a little less than i would like but great value for money
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first baby so you know I’m super picky and I love this crib!! Sooo cute and awesome for boy or girl!!! I wanted something I could use for my next baby that is gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great crib! Came on time, was very easy to assemble, good quality and looks nice! Only thing that I was expecting different was it was shorter than I thought. Looks good though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but other than that great crib
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sturdy and exactly as described! Only reason I’m leaving 4 stars is because it arrived damaged on the TOP FRONT piece. I don’t want to deal with the hassle of returning a huge heavy package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Delta Children Emery 4-in-1 Convertible Baby Crib, White
product_meta.description: Style:4-in-1 Crib| Color:White| Size:Crib OnlyDurable, stable and stylish, the emery 4-in-1 crib from delta children will charm for years to come. Converting from a multi-positional crib to a toddler bed, daybed and full size bed, it's designed to be a part of your little one's life from infancy to adulthood. Featuring a slightly curved headboard and airy slats, this beautifully crafted crib is also JPMA certified to ensure your child's safety.
feature_bullets: GROWS WITH BABY: The 3 position mattress height adjustment on this crib allows you to lower the mattress as your baby begins to sit or stand
BUILT TO LAST: Strong and sturdy wood construction helps create a dream nursery where you’ll spend plenty of Mommy and Me/Daddy and Me time. Easy assembly

WE PUT YOUR BABY’S SAFETY FIRST: This crib is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM. Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards
SIZE: 55.75 W x 30.25 D x 43.75 H Inches. Fits standard size crib mattress (sold separately)
CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from a crib to a toddler bed, daybed and full size bed with headboard (Daybed Rail included; Toddler Guardrail #0080 and Full Size Metal Bed Frame #0040 sold separately)

specifications.Additional product features: Converts to a Daybed, Converts to a Toddler Bed
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,160 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
